Description:
Brand New Belmont Beauty!
{Due to the current situation, one on one appointments will be conducted as needed, public open homes will not be conducted. We ask that everyone adheres to the current government guidelines regarding social distancing and hygiene}
If you want a new home, but dont want to be too far out, or cant be bothered waiting for builders to finish, then this is the one for you! It has only just been completed and ticks all the boxes for the fussy buyer.
Some features include:
3br with Built in Robes, main with ensuite
North facing, open living area and nice, sheltered backyard
Generous single garage with auto rollerdoor
LED lights throughout
Ducted gas heating and split system cooling and heating
This Lovely, compact, detached home represents fantastic value and would make an ideal first home, investment or downsizer. If you dont like the idea of being stuck out in the new subdivisions but want a new house in a private convenient location, then this brand-new, cleverly laid out home is a must to inspect.
Phone Jackson Wilson on 0418991988
Insights: 9/61 Bailey Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Enviable home with stunning views in prime location!
Set on a corner block on approx. 952m2, this spacious property has something to impress every family member! Showcasing sweeping views over Geelong and the bay, beautiful entertaining options, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this superb family lifestyle! Ideally positioned in Highton, this home places you within easy reach of life's amenities.
From the moment you arrive this enviable home will capture your hearts, the grand dual staircase leads you up to the entry of the home with the outlook at the top of the stairs being sublime. Upon entry the entry hall and formal living zone welcome you into the home. The open plan kitchen/living/dining zone creates a wealth of space for entertaining family and friends with Bay windows capture the stunning views.
The kitchen is functional with an impressive island bench/breakfast bar with large benchtop, built-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, 900mm oven, gas hob, rangehood).With access straight out to the rear outdoor entertaining zone and French doors leading straight out to the verandah for the perfect balance of indoor/outdoor entertaining.
The generous Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite with a spa-bath and shower. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom, 3rd toilet, and large laundry with storage and access externally
Ducted heating and 2 x s/s units along with ceiling fans throughout keep you in the utmost comfort all year long. A separate rumpus room to the rear of the home features a bar area and access through French doors to the back yard. The perfect teenage retreat, pool room
Established trees and gardens surround the home, creating a very private back yard and features a paved undercover entertaining area.
Additional features include hardwood Victorian ash floorboards, a wine cellar conveniently located under the dining room table, accessible by stairs, ducted vacuuming system, multiple living zones inside and out, a verandah at the front of the home to sit back, relax and soak in the views, a double remote lock up garage with 2 x separate roller doors into the yard with storage space for a trailer and an additional garden shed completes the backyard.
Superbly located within walking distance to the Barwon river, Young families will appreciate that Fyans Park Primary School, Highton Primary School and Montpellier Primary School are close by along with the best of Geelong's Private schools for both primary and high school. With the Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza and charming Highton Village moments away to take care of all your shopping and dining needs. With superior access to the Ring Road, commuting to Melbourne or the Surf Coast is a breeze.
With so much to offer, this Highton residence is simply superb! Inspect ASAP!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Walking distance to Highton Village
This contemporary 3 bedroom townhouse within walking distance to Highton Village, offers a great opportunity to secure a home in an amazing position with everything you could possibly need right at your doorstep. Ideal for a first home buyer, investor, down sizer or a family wanting access to some of the most popular schools in the zone. Highton & Bellaire Primary Schools, Clairvaux Catholic School, Belmont High School and Christian College are all within minutes. Waurn Ponds Shopping Complex and Reading Cinemas are a short drive down the road. Easy access to the Geelong Ring Road, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Waurn Ponds station and bus stops for those needing public transport.
Contemporary tones throughout and a functional floor plan, private and secure and on its own title of 412m2
• Large light filled separate lounge room
• Open plan kitchen, dining & family room with split system and sliding door access to the outdoor area and private yard
• Spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and walk in pantry
• Three spacious bedrooms upstairs BR 2 & 3 with built in robes
• Master bedroom with walk in robe, split system & ensuite with double shower
• Upstairs central bath room and separate toilet
• Powder room downstairs
• Remote double garage with internal access and rear door to yard
• Brivis ducted central heating
If you have been looking for a low maintenance home in a wonderful location of Highton, then 14 Rathmines Place is the one for you!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT!
Full of ambient warmth, this stunning haven in a highly desirable & tightly held pocket of Highton location offers comfort, style and an amazing life of leisure and convenience for the whole family to love.
Upon entry, the large formal lounge room boasts a large bay window with expansive views and flows through to the beating heart of the home. 
The master suite is complete with ensuite and walk-in robe, whilst another 2 large bedrooms (with built in robes) provide plenty of room for the growing family. The bedrooms share a sparkling family bathroom.
Open plan living, dining and kitchen is orientated to the north-east surroundings with private alfresco and natural light are drawn throughout the interior.
The kitchen area is fitted with laminate bench tops, walk in pantry, dishwasher, electric oven and gas stove which easily cater to the requirements of a large family.
Ducted heating throughout and split system cooling ensure year round comfort.
Ample car accommodation consists of a double remote garage with internal access, plus extra vehicle/boat/caravan storage also on-site with extra parking spaces courtesy of the quiet cul-dec-sac.
Perfectly located in a premium position within a stones throw to Highton Village, Barrabool Hills Plaza while also being convenient to Waurn Ponds Plaza, plus excellent Ring Road access providing smooth commuting to Melbourne & the Surf Coast, Zoned to Geelong's finest Schools both Primary & Secondary including Montpellier, Highton & Clairvaux Primary and the ever popular Belmont High, St Josephs, Sacred Heart & Geelong College.
Insights: 17 Victory Way, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New Luxury in the Ultimate Location
Opportunity to buy a brand new in highly sought established Highton is rare. Finished to perfection, this home will take your breath away. Spacious and light, incredible attention to detail a north aspect and boasting panoramic views, this home is the perfect example of luxury low maintenance living.
- Stone benchtop to kitchen and bathrooms
- 900mm gas cooking appliances
- Oversized walk-in pantry
- Hardwood flooring, Central heating and cooling
- Double garage with additional storage space
- Outdoor alfresco area and good sized useable yard
- Just a few minutes to Highton Village and Barrabool Hills Shopping
- Minutes to nearby walking trails, Buckley Falls and Queens Park.
- Easy access to local schools and the Ring Road for commuters
Fantastic established location in the heart of Highton

Description:
A Magnificent Lifestyle Choice
Perched in leafy Old Highton and showcasing city skyline and river views this exceptional residence spread across two levels has been freshly updated throughout and offers a sensational lifestyle choice with the Barwon River only moments away.
From the moment you enter, you're greeted by a tasteful balance of charming fixtures and fittings to highlight one of three living zones, a gorgeous lounge with open fire place ensuring come winter time you will not want to leave. The entry level offers a master suite that flows onto the balcony and is equipped with a decadent ensuite and walk in robe. Two additional bedrooms boasting fantastic storage are accompanied by a central bathroom. To the heart of the home, an enormous open kitchen, living and dining that sprawls out to the balcony backlit by those fantastic views - day or night, it is simply outstanding.
For those wanting some retreat from the kids or room for guests, the home provides. Downstairs, two huge bedrooms with storage to match feature alongside yet another lounge space and bathroom.
With all of this accommodation, there's still plenty of yard space for the kids and pets to enjoy and even the possibility for the pool or entertaining area if desired!
Insights: 3 Mawarra Court, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Multi-level home with fantastic lifestyle appeal
Youll love:
This fabulous multi-level home is perfectly situated one street back from Jan Jucs main beach & cliff top walks.
Being greeted by the light-filled entrance thats connected to a large alfresco courtyard with a hot & cold outdoor shower for added convenience!
Watching the sun rise over the ocean from the top floor master retreat that has a private balcony & ensuite, plus WIRs & a lounge area.
The impossible-to-miss high vaulted ceilings, lovely timber floors & warm earthy tones throughout.
Plus:
At the heart of the creative floor plan is the renovated kitchen with walk-in pantry & a meals area that branches out to separate living wings on either side.
The front section comprises of the main living room with a cosy wood heater; and the upstairs master retreat.
The back section of the home features a central bathroom & laundry, plus a study with a mezzanine level, and sunken 2nd living area connected to 3 additional bedrooms with BIRs.
Theres also a large backyard with an entertainers deck & a veggie patch, plus a huge studio thats above the double garage with loads of storage options too!
Insights: 4 Troon Ave, Jan Juc VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020.

Fully titled and ready to build!
Fully titled (395sqm approx, 14m frontage) and ready to go, take advantage of the Governments home builders grant. This is a fantastic opportunity to build your dream home, located in the heart of Marshall and just a short drive to the amazing Surf Coast with easy access to Marshall train station ensures a quick commute to Melbourne. Walking distance to Grovedale Primary School, IGA and Aldi and a short drive to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre. A truly wonderful opportunity and a fantastic position to call home, dont let this opportunity pass you by.

Description:
FANTASTIC ENTRY LEVEL ENTERTAINER
A great opportunity exists with this fantastic brick constructed home perfect for a young family or couple looking for a coastal downsizer. The well presented home features 3 large bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, open plan kitchen/dining with a further spacious lounge, central heating, reverse cycle A/C, hardwood timber floors, double garage with drive through access at the rear and beautifully landscaped well maintained mature gardens.
Situated on a sunny allotment with a low maintenance backyard highlighted by the large alfresco decked patio area, ideal for BBQs and entertaining.
The property is in the highly sought after Quay Estate with Hilltop park just 100m (approx.) away, easy walking distance to the Loch Ard Drive shops, Whites Beach, transport and schools making it desirable for many.

Description:
Make Everyone Happy
Located in a quiet court is this appealing Malishev built three bedroom home which has something the whole family will enjoy. If you are a tradesperson then you are going to love the double garage with through access to a huge shed. Entertaining is easy with separate living areas with two gas wall heaters, built in display cabinet plus tiled open plan living. Other features include kitchen meals area with gas cook top and dishwasher, main bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, loads of storage, built in robes in the additional two bedrooms, ducted vacuum system, alarm system, paved outdoor entertaining plus a secure rear garden for the kids to play. This is a great opportunity to enjoy all the benefits which Belmont has to offer.

Description:
On the banks of the Barwon
Nestled high above the banks of the Barwon River in such a highly sought after area of Highton. Situated a stones throw away from the beautiful Barwon river walking trails, a short drive from the Highton shopping village with its cafes and boutique stores, and some of Geelongs best primary and secondary schools. Set on an 844m2 allotment this property encompasses stunning views of the Barwon River and its surrounds. The lower level comprising a spacious master bedroom with built in robes and ensuite, accompanied by a sitting room or study including split system unit and access to the deck perfectly positioned to soak up the sun and views from the Barwon river and Geelong abroad and a formal dining area. The upper level boasts the updated kitchen complete with gas cooktop, large pantry and an adjoining meals area. The spacious main lounge area includes a split system unit and built in entertainment unit, a glass sliding door opens wide to the second deck again with views. An additional two bedrooms both with built in robes and serviced by a central bathroom complete with heritage green claw foot bath tub. The separate laundry with built in cabinetry completing this exceptional floor plan. Step outside from the main lounge to the covered and paved alfresco area. The large paved area extends further to the corner of the backyard grassed area. Features include gas ducted heating, secure double garage, with plenty of storage under the house and a large front yard.
For more information on this property text '48 Barwon' to 0428 444 841

Description:
A Place To Call Home!
Set in a tightly-held pocket of Old Highton, this residence presents an irresistible opportunity upon approx. 826m2! The home's elevated position captures sweeping views over Highton, while three indoor living zones create a wealth of space for growing families!
A variety of sporting grounds are virtually on your doorstep with a walking trail leading directly to the Tim Hill Recreation Reserve. Public transport is also a short walk away, while the charming Highton Village is within easy reach for all of your shopping and dining needs. Families will appreciate the nearby schools including. Highton Primary School and the Christian College Campuses. Easy access to the Ring Road adds the final touch to this desirable locale.
The downstairs layout creates a lovely indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for both casual family living and entertaining. The spacious lounge opens onto the front verandah via French doors, while the open plan family/dining/kitchen zone unites with the sheltered alfresco. With the open plan family zone also boasting a wood heater, youll love that a cosy setting is created during the cooler months. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). The study is ideal for students and home business owners alike, while the powder room and laundry with storage complete the lower level.
The upstairs living room creates a generous retreat and opens onto the wrap-around balcony, where you can sit back and savour the far-reaching views. The Master Bedroom will delight with a walk-in robe and ensuite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, while the separate toilet features dual access from the living room and ensuite. Two gas wall heaters and a split-system air conditioner provide additional comfort.
Whether youre planning a casual family BBQ or a lively gathering, the sheltered alfresco will effortlessly accommodate. The spacious backyard inspires outdoor family fun, while also boasting a garden shed and veggie patch. The double lock-up garage features a workshop, plus a rear roller door that provides additional vehicle storage. Ticking every box for a superb family lifestyle, this Highton residence is an absolute gem! Inspect without delay!
Insights: 15 Knollbrook Close, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Polished Renovation Equipped for a Dream Lifestyle
One step inside this stunning residence and you will instantly notice it's been built and renovated to exceed expectations for all buyers. Designed to take advantage of the abundance of natural light, the kitchen truly is the heart of the home with it's adjoining dining and living area that provide a seamless connection to the expansive outdoor entertainment area and rear yard.
Completely move-in ready, this is the perfect opportunity for first home buyers, investors and families alike, the astute buyer will find terrific growth in the home while enjoying all the spoils the home has to offer without lifting a finger.

- Impressive Chef's kitchen with electric cooktop, stainless steel appliances
- Ducted central heating, ceiling fans throughout, split-system cooling
- Quality renovation throughout, two great sized alfrescos
- Spacious and private rear yard, low maintenance gardens
- Off-street parking for up to six cars
- Five minutes to Leopold Primary School and local shopping center
- Five minutes to Bellarine Peninsula's greatest wineries
- 15 Minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical Gardens

Description:
Family home in a tranquil location
This home provides peace & quiet being set back from the road, while still being centrally positioned in a quiet part of Torquay with schools, the town center, Spring Creek Reserve and patrolled beaches a lovely short walk away. You will not want to miss this one with the kitchen, dining & living area upstairs flowing out onto a decked balcony providing stunning ocean views.
Kitchen- tiled, down lights, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, laminate bench tops with overhang for breakfast bench, ample storage including spacious built in pantry, access to decked balcony with ocean views
Living- upstairs to make the most of ocean views, carpeted, down lights, split system, venetian blinds & square set corners throughout
Master bedroom- carpet, downlights, window with curtain, built in shelving, ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles, shower, vanity with basin & mirror, toilet
Additional three bedrooms- 2 downstairs & 1 upstairs, carpet, downlights, windows for natural light & curtains for privacy, built in shelving
Main bathroom- floor to ceiling tiles, deep bath, shower, vanity with storage & basin, downlights, toilet
Outdoor- large allotment with spacious backyard & beautiful views, established gardens & lawns including fruit trees, brick pathway leading to front door & decked porch area wrapping around front of home with enough room for chairs
Mod cons- double car garage & large driveway with space for parking, laundry with trough, cupboard storage & access to garage & backyard, study nook upstairs off kitchen area, large balcony with deck & ocean views, reverse cycle split system to living, ducted heating
Ideal for: families, investors, couples
Close by local facilities: schools, Torquay town center, Spring Creek Reserve and patrolled beaches all only a short walk away

Description:
HIGHLY SOUGHT AFTER VACANT LAND!!
This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase vacant land in the popular Stretton Estate, already titled and ready to go!! On offer is a great sized allotment of 554m2 with no time restrictions to build and a 14.98 metre frontage by 37 metres in length and no easements on the block giving you the perfect blank canvas to build your dream coastal home!
Positioned in a convenient and family friendly location within walking distance to Torquay Coast Primary School, Lisieux Catholic Primary School, Surf Coast Secondary College, North Torquay shopping centre and sporting reserves.
This vacant land is sure to move quickly, enquire today.

Description:
SIMPLY STUNNING IN THE SANDS ESTATE
Impressive proportions, a meticulous presentation, flowing living spaces and gorgeous outlooks are but some of the hallmarks of this sophisticated, master built and unique Sands residence. Architecturally designed and invitingly versatile, this property offers every luxury for the those seeking the very best in a fantastic location.
Of generous proportions over two levels, the home offers four bedrooms, three living areas, a beautifully appointed kitchen, three bathrooms, parents retreat, office/study and a sweeping deck set around the solar heated, north side in ground pool.
Further details and features include:
- An impressive entrance foyer and hallway with Aireys Inlet highlight limestone walls and natural light abounding
- A deluxe stone kitchen of enormous proportions with butlers pantry, state of the art appliances, glass splash back and more than ample bench and cupboard space
- Open plan ground floor dining and living set around a welcoming gas log fire and opening to the second covered outdoor deck and entertaining area
- Theatre room and generous first floor, third living area / family room
- Expansive master suite adjoins a dedicated parents retreat plus a superb full ensuite and with access to the sunny first floor deck with views out over the waterways and the 2nd Sands fairway
- Highlight stone flooring, pitched ceilings, floor and panel hydronic heating systems, air conditioners, ducted vacuum, CTV, security system, surround sound speakers and commercial grade Argon windows
- A large garage/workshop with direct house access, auto roller door and yard access to a covered, side service area and outdoor shower
- A very private and sheltered new, solar heated swimming pool
- Established, low maintenance gardens and grounds and just one neighbouring property
- Large, underground rainwater tank for the garden and servicing the toilets
- The property is well located on a substantial allotment within close proximity to the Sands clubhouse and facilities, the beach and the many services and attractions that Torquay has to offer
An extravagant and lavish home offering the best of all things residential amidst tranquil surrounds and relaxing outlooks.

Description:
Beautifully Renovated Double Fronted Victorian
This stunning home has been meticulously renovated to the highest standard. Retaining its period charm whilst offering modern convenience and comfortable living. Featuring a classic entry with high ceilings, hardwood flooring and a gorgeous kitchen with 900mm oven and ample bench space. The spacious open plan living and dining offers an abundance of light-filled living space which opens onto a large timber deck, ideal for entertaining. The three large bedrooms offer ample accommodation and are serviced by a wonderful two-way bathroom/ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles and large w/in robe. The home also has ducted heating, evaporative cooling, separate laundry, second toilet and a cast iron fireplace. The rear street access is ideal for two to three vehicles, perfect for the car enthusiast or tradesman. The huge garage also offers a separate rumpus room/study which is perfect for teenagers, a home office or second living area. Located in the sought-after river end of Belmont, this wonderful home is just a short walk to High Street Shopping Strip, cafes, local schools, Geelong CBD and the Barwon River.
View the auction via live stream at the link below
https://auctionnow.com.au/properties/62041
- Quiet location close to shopping, cafes, restaurants and Barwon River.
- Fully renovated, re-stumped, re-plumbed, re-wired and re-roofed.
- Rear street access to a large garage for two-three cars plus rumpus/studio room.
- Stunning façade with Victorian features established gardens and new decking.
- Tall ceilings, hardwood flooring, ducted heating, evaporative cooling.
- Gorgeous two-way bathroom/ensuite, two separate toilets and laundry.
- Large open plan kitchen dining and living opening onto a large entertaining deck.
- Secure and private back yard ideal for pets and children.
- Move in and enjoy this wonderful lifestyle location of river end Belmont.
- Close to the Geelong CBD, South Geelong Train Station the Barwon River.
Insights: 30 Seaview Parade, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.
